message: Import statement for 'com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'THIRD_PARTY_PACKAGE' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.

参数名'xStream' 必须匹配模式：'^[a-z]([a-z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9]*)?$'。
